column2: Alcoa to shut Sao Luis smelter in Brazil March 30 Aluminum maker Alcoa Inc said on Monday it would shut the remaining 74
column3: 000 metric tons of capacity at its Sao Luis smelter in Brazil due to weak metal prices and high costs.

column2: EXCLUSIVE-Pentagon chief sends military wish lists to Congress with reservations WASHINGTON
column3: March 30 U.S. Defense Secretary Ash Carter on Monday sent the military's annual "wish lists" to U.S. lawmakers
column4: including 12 Boeing Co F/A-18 fighter jets and 14 Lockheed Martin Corp F-35 fighter jets
column5: but said he would not back any of the requests unless Congress passed a larger overall defense budget.

column27: March 30 European stocks were set to rise on Monday
column28: bouncing back from last week's losses with tech shares in focus after news of merger talks in the sector spurred a late-session rally on Wall Street on Friday.     Intel Corp is in talks to buy fellow chipmaker Altera Corp  in a deal likely to top $10 billion
column29: according to a source familiar with the matter
column30: which would make it Intel's biggest acquisition ever and the latest merger in the quickly consolidating semiconductor sEuropean stocks bounce back
